titleOptionsJqlIcon.message: Icon for the workspace. See the list of available icons. Ignore icon-* prefix.

hintRequiredJiraAgile.message: To use transition features please ensure that your JIRA instance has the JIRA Agile add-on installed.

hintHowCredentialsAreStored.message: Jironimo doesn't use any kind of middleware to process the credentials. They are stored only at your machine.

hintSynchroniseSettings.message: Settings for the current extension will be available on different devices (native Google Chrome sync is used)
